message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
I'm really interested in the product, but $175 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

I understand that $175 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $155. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.

I understand that you're trying to find a compromise, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $150. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $145. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but $145 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. I'm hoping we can finally meet at a price that works for both of us.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I really need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'll sell it to you for $142.50. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $142.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $137.50 for the product. I'm hoping we can finally reach an agreement.

I'm really close to walking away from the negotiation, Bob. I've already gone lower than I wanted to, and I'm starting to feel like I'm not getting a fair deal. I'll sell the product to you for $140. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider selling it to someone else.

I understand that you're close to walking away, but I'm still not willing to pay $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $137.50 and $140, so I'll offer $138.75 for the product. This is my final offer.
